scale.description: Scaling factor for the direct subsurface scattering back-diffuse.

distortion.description: Amount of scattering distortion that occurs inside this material.

power.description: Attenuation power factor for subsurface scattering contributions.

colorFactor.description: Diffuse color of the inner (non-translucent) parts of the material

colorTexture.description: Diffuse color of the inner (non-translucent) parts of the material

thicknessFactor.description: Modulates direct translucency of the material.

thicknessTexture.description: Texture describing the local thickness of the material; 0 is thin.
thicknessTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: Should be generated offline by flipping the normals of the mesh and computing the ambient occlusion map. This texture is a grayscale, where darker areas imply the material is locally thinner there, while brighter areas are locally thicker. There are many free and paid tools for baking these thickness maps.
